title: Copy/Paste all form fields' content
body: I often have pages with forms from which I need to copy all the fields (be it even the text ones only) and paste into the same form for another entry. More specifically, I do it mostly with two YouTube videos where I copy title, description, keywords and even a message for subscribers (and GPS location). In some cases, it's because the content for both movies is similar enough, to use as a template, and in some because I have two movies for virtually the same thing (short and real-time).
